## Data Description

Something about the data here.

```{r echo=FALSE}
Name <- c('year', 
          'make', 
          'model', 
          'trim', 
          'body', 
          'transmission',
          'vin', 
          'state', 
          'condition', 
          'odometer', 
          'color', 
          'interior',
          'seller', 
          'mmr', 
          'sellingprice', 
          'saledate')
Description <- c('Year of the car',                     # Year
                 'Make of the car',                     # Make
                 'Model of the car',                    # Model
                 'Trim level of the car',               # Trim
                 'Body type of the car',                # Body
                 'Type of transmission in car',         # Transmission
                 'Vehicle identification number',       # VIN
                 'State vehicle was sold in',           # State
                 'Rating of the condition of the car',  # Condition
                 'Number of miles on car at sale',      # Odometer
                 'Exterior color of the car',           # Color
                 'Interior color of the car',           # Interior
                 'Selling party name',                  # Seller
                 'Manheim Market Report value',         # MMR
                 'Final sale price',                    # Selling Price
                 'Date of sale')                        # Sale Date
Type <- c('Discrete',   # Year
          'Nominal',    # Make
          'Nominal',    # Model
          'Nominal',    # Trim
          'Nominal',    # Body
          'Nominal',    # Transmission
          'Discrete',   # VIN
          'Nominal',    # State
          'Ordinal',    # Condition 
          'Continuous', # Odometer
          'Nominal',    # Color
          'Nominal',    # Interior
          'Nominal',    # Seller
          'Continuous',  # MMR
          'Continuous', # Selling Price
          'Ordinal')    # Sale Date
variable_data <- data.frame(Name, Description, Type)
kable(variable_data)
```
